posts.title: Snow is DEAD!
posts.content: I was so upset like what do you mean Snow was ran over by my mum in the garadge and she had no remourse whatsoever!she just said i get another one I'm too old to be getting upset anyways she still got me two cats though i just wish she said sorry you know?
posts.author: Shalon Njeri

posts.title: Why I Love Painting
posts.content: It's hard to explain wy you love something so deeply especially if you're not that perfect but they say practice makes perfect right? so umm basically i love painting cause it allows me to express my artistic nature and the smell ofv paint is so addictive i don't know lmao
posts.author: mumbi njeri

posts.title: favourite town i have visited and i got inspired
posts.content: hands down malindi!that place is so beautiful the air is so fresh the people are so nice and funny enough no  one judges you for wearing a dera to town lol i loved that cause it was too  hot and the food there omg!! its to die for.
posts.author: shalon mumbi

posts.title: my pov on self improvement
posts.content: hey listen don't be hard on yourself each day ypu are growing and learning so take one step at a time and if you need to crash out just crash out!i do that all the time and it has solved a lot of my problems lol.
posts.author: mumbi shalon
